name: CxB solutions
overview:
CxB provides fraud and revenue protection software to telecom operators worldwide.

CxB listened to telecommunication service providers, their needs, concerns and ideas before developing risk management software solutions tailored for each individual operator.

Regardless the size of operation, CxB’s software solutions will protect telecom operators’ profits and reputation. A system with a model that monitors subscribers’ behaviour and learns whilst it analyses, thus providing operators with the information they need to make informed decisions with regard future business plans.

The company’s suite of risk management software currently offers protection against: • SIM box fraud • SIM card cloning fraud • Dealer fraud • Revenue assurance

CxB’s team offers expertise garnered from years of experience working with telecom operators, Fraud Management System editors and financial institutions.

milestones.description: CxB provides protection for telecom operators from SIM box fraud/bypass fraud, SIM card cloning, dealer fraud and revenue leakage. Risk management applications to protect operators˙ revenue, customers and reputation.
